    public class LdapUserService
extends GitblitUserService
    Implementation of an LDAP user service.

    John Crygier

      Setup the user service.
      boolean supportsCredentialChanges()
      Credentials are defined in the LDAP server and can not be manipulated from Gitblit.
      boolean supportsDisplayNameChanges()
      If no displayName pattern is defined then Gitblit can manage the display name.
      boolean supportsEmailAddressChanges()
      If no email pattern is defined then Gitblit can manage the email address.
      boolean supportsTeamMembershipChanges()
      If the LDAP server will maintain team memberships then LdapUserService will not allow team membership changes.

        public void setup(IStoredSettings settings)
        Description copied from interface: IUserService
        Setup the user service. This method allows custom implementations to retrieve settings from gitblit.properties or the web.xml file without relying on the GitBlit static singleton.

      • supportsTeamMembershipChanges

        public boolean supportsTeamMembershipChanges()
        If the LDAP server will maintain team memberships then LdapUserService will not allow team membership changes. In this scenario all team changes must be made on the LDAP server by the LDAP administrator.
        Specified by:
        supportsTeamMembershipChanges in interface IUserService
        Overrides:
        supportsTeamMembershipChanges in class GitblitUserService
        Returns:
        true or false
        Since:
        1.0.0
